sachem_iner wrote:

> I'm trying to launch some JUnit TestCase referenced in a JUnit TestSuite
> with this code :
> 
> AllTests testSuite = new AllTests();
> TestRunner.run(testSuite.getClass());
> 
> that code produce this error :
<snip />

First, you could do the same with this:

TestRunner.run(AllTests.class);

I'm going to /guess/ that your AllTests class has no test methods, but 
rather has its own suite() method. If that's the case, then try this:

TestRunner.run(AllTests.suite());

It's a little big (somewhere) that 'new TestSuite(AllTests.class)' 
doesn't first look in AllTests for a suite() method. It only collects 
test*() methods.

I discuss this in detail somewhere in _JUnit Recipes_, but frankly, I 
can't remember where.

Good luck.
